data.text: @CressidaVT This is coming from someone in California where we just got out of lockdown last week. 2 years of this has messed everything up, even with a vaccine that doesn’t even stop people from getting it. We are at the point of needing to live life and let it run its course.

@GoldenXumai Yeah, but these people are the ones that pass covid more. 

I wish it was as simple as “let people do what they want” tbh. 

They aren’t locked down, go, and then stay quarantine for a month just in case. 

Would be nice, though.
@CressidaVT I’m saying is let people live their life the way they want to. Those who are fearful can stay at home.

@GoldenXumai I live a small county in Texas where I know lots of people that passed from covid complications. Covid still affects us and sometimes there isn’t even food or pet supplies. 

This is a new wave coming, and we’re not prepared for being in lockdown for a few months again. :/
@CressidaVT Damm I saw the green face and immediately thought Damm she gonna say something like ew boss but also stay safe homie love u ❤
@bossuare I opened the app and it was promoted tweet 🤢
@CressidaVT It’s been 2 years. Let it run it’s course and move on with life.
@CressidaVT I just hate people at this point
